text: media companies are adapting by trying
to be as light and Nimble as possible
not syn a tremendous amount of
investment into one particular
technology but be able to operate off
the cloud and adapt to the changing
landscape to the needs of new platforms
that might emerge that might host their
content we think of Dow Jones both as
one of the Premier newspaper companies
in the world we're also a Next
Generation Media Company we're a mobile
first company we innovate the platforms
people consume content from we innovate
how they consume that content every time
our developers do that they need
machines to do development on they need
test environments to work against the
public Cloud lets us build up and tear
down those environments extremely
quickly the classic product process that
Dow Jones was we'd have an idea for a
great product we'd go and spend months
sort of building out the technology for
it and if it wasn't successful on day
one we were left holding a huge bill now
we can go and reach out to the public
Cloud build a new product try it out out
scale it up if it's successful tweak it
and adjust it if it's not and more
importantly we're building things with a
microservices architecture where each
piece sort of stands alone so we can
assemble those piece parts and grow
those piece Parts as need be to build
more
quickly we have come a long way from
being a newspaper company to being a
news company we were restricted to just
one medium and that was newspaper now
with Cloud medium does not matter to us
we are creating content for the people
they read us via their cell phones via
their laptops and now we are going to
launch our online video platform on Roku
TV and Android TV what you need to be is
flexible and in order to do that you
have to have as sort of thin and light a
structure as possible the fact that we
had Scrappy new companies coming up
competing with us we had to be able to
innovate and fail fast like a startup
and to behave that way we had to have
the tools that let us do that so one of
the things that Amazon really have
enabled for us is to go and build
products much more quickly the fact that
people are able to deliver content with
such minimum amounts of resources is is
is a phenomena itself the TV channels
the newspapers the radio companies will
all have to move online if they have not
done it so far and it it is only
possible via Cloud because no one has
the capacity to to deploy
300 distribution servers throughout the
world you have to move onto the cloud
you cannot just do it by yourself
